features: Adult Regular size: 78 x 33 in. (198.12 x 83.82 cm), fits up to 5 ft. 11 in. tall
3 lbs (1.36 kg) Coletherm® insulation provides better heat retention with less weight
Durable brushed polyester cover with brushed polyester liner
- ZipPlow™ zipper provides snag-free opening and closing
- Comfort Cuff™ surrounds your face with softness when you sleep
- Roll Control™ system keeps your bag straight while rolling it up
- Quick Cord™ technology offers no tie patented closure for easy, one-person packing
Thermolock™ technology draft tube prevents heat loss through the zipper
Contoured head keeps your head and pillow off the floor
Interior tuck pocket to conveniently store small items
